title: Terms of Service
description: Terms of service for this service.
section1Body: These terms define the conditions for use of this service. Users are required to agree to these terms when using the service.
section2Body: Users may register by agreeing to these terms and applying through the designated method. We may refuse registration in certain cases.
section3Body: Users must not engage in the following when using the service.
section3Item1: Acts violating laws or public order
section3Item3: Acts that may hinder operation of the service
section3Item4: Infringement of other users' or third parties' rights
section4Body: We may suspend all or part of the service without prior notice in cases such as maintenance, force majeure, or when we deem it necessary.
section5Body: We do not guarantee that the service is free of factual or legal defects. We are not liable for any damage arising from the service.
section6Body: We may change these terms without notice when necessary. Revised terms take effect when posted on the service.
section7Body: For inquiries regarding these terms, please contact us through the service contact form.
